M

Main - GUI中的类
Class Main Entry class
Main() - 类 的构造器GUI.Main
 
main(String[]) - 类 中的静态方法GUI.Main
 
MainGUI - GUI中的类
The main interface control, mainly to choose the game mode, access to the chess game player, and display the game interactive information.
MainGUI() - 类 的构造器GUI.MainGUI
 
move(Position, Position) - 类 中的方法game.Board
move piece Determine whether the movement is correct, check whether the game is finished after moving, and then move according to the type of piece.
moveTo(Position) - 类 中的方法game.Piece
Move a piece to a certain position
MSocket - socket中的类
Class MSocket Socket and ServerSocket are encapsulated to connect and transmit information to players play online-game
MSocket() - 类 的构造器socket.MSocket
